name: AutoDot
introduction: Tuning Quantum devices with a flexible statistical approach.

sections.title: Goal
sections.content: Quantum devices used to implement spin qubits in semiconductors are challenging to tune and characterize. AutoDot is a statistical approach to tuning such devices flexibly.

sections.title: My work
sections.content: I'm working on a new unit vector sampler using the Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy.
